message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily routine and bring convenience to your life. I believe it's worth more than $80 to you, considering its unique features and benefits. Would you like to explore this opportunity further?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'd like to get a better deal. Can you meet me in the middle at $80?
